Player History
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Houston on 9/25/1965...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1965, hitting .480 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1966, hitting .400 with 6 HR, 25 RBI...
Won World Series with Pittsburgh in 1966...
Was selected to the 1967 Allstar game...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Cincinnati on 1/31/1968 (Going to CIN: P D. Lines, 2B B. Mazeroski. Going to PIT: P C. Hough)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1968, hitting .517 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
Traded from Cincinnati to Texas on 5/21/1969 (Going to CIN: LF T. Agee, P T. Metcalf, P G. Bell. Going to TEX: 2B B. Mazeroski, SS C. Tovar)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1969, hitting .524 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Had 2000th career hit on 9/28/1969, off Bob Sadowski (CAL)...
Drove in 7 runs against Baltimore on 5/3/1970...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Detroit on 6/1/1970...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (A) on 6/16/1970...
Was selected to the 1970 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/10/1970 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Hit 3 homeruns against Detroit, driving in 3 runs on 5/15/1971...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Injured on 5/5/1972 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Series with Texas in 1972...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 1972...
